USE_CACHE.description: Indicates if contributions and routeprovider should be cached

DEFAULT_CONTEXTPATH.description: Context path is set from request, but uses this as fallback

HIDE_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT.description: Time to show the notification bar

ALWAYS_COMMIT_FORM.description: Always commit form, does not show result pages for instruments

HORIZONTAL_FORM_LABEL_CLASS.description: CSS class that sets the width of the attribute labels. Range from 1 to 11

RENDER_QUESTION_LABELS.description: Render instrument and event question labels on forms (might result in duplicate labels)

AVAILABLE_LIST_VIEWS.description: Renders a toggle with supported list views, options are ListView and TableView

CHANGEPASSWORD_PATH.description: Deeplink to change password page / component

USERPROFILE_PATH.description: Deeplink to user profile page / component
